1. AVIS staff will review and activate your account
2. The process takes about 45 days
3. Once you are verified as a donor, you'll receive a notification by email
4. Once you verify your email, you'll be able to create a 5-digit PIN to log into the system

caseStudies.heading: Transforming donor engagement across Italy
caseStudies.subtitle: Vitalita partners with blood donation organizations to create measurable impact quickly. Explore selected initiatives from our community.

avisLombardia.summary: Unified donor CRM and dynamic scheduling across 12 provinces, reducing no-shows by 22% and improving staff utilization.
avisLombardia.detail: Automated reminders via Telegram and SMS replaced manual phone trees, freeing coordinators for outreach.

croceRossaToscana.summary: Streamlined mobile blood drive coordination with real-time inventory tracking, increasing collection efficiency by 35% across regional campaigns.
croceRossaToscana.detail: Integrated scheduling system enabled better resource allocation and reduced wait times, resulting in higher donor satisfaction and retention rates.

fidasVeneto.summary: Digital transformation of donor registration and eligibility management, cutting administrative overhead by 40% while improving data accuracy.
fidasVeneto.detail: Automated eligibility checks and digital forms eliminated paper-based processes, allowing staff to focus on donor engagement and community outreach.

header.title: Everything You Need to Manage Blood Donations Efficiently
header.description: Vitalita unifies scheduling, donor engagement, and analytics into a single operating platform tailored for AVIS and Italian healthcare networks. Give every coordinator and volunteer a modern workspace designed for faster decisions and safer collections.

smartScheduling.description: Give coordinators a live command center to balance donation slots, staff, and equipment across every location with confidence.
smartScheduling.benefits: Reduce scheduling conflicts by 90%, save 15 hours per week

donorManagement.description: Maintain a complete view of every donor—from health history to eligibility windows—so teams can focus on relationships, not spreadsheets.
donorManagement.benefits: Track 10,000+ donors effortlessly, ensure compliance automatically

communicationTools.description: Launch multi-channel, personalized outreach that keeps donors engaged—without adding work for coordinators.
communicationTools.benefits: Increase show-up rates by 40%, reduce no-shows dramatically

details: Configure your donation centers and locations

Import your existing donor database (CSV/Excel support)

Continuously monitor and optimize operations for peak performance

faq.title: Implementation Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about getting started with Vitalita

setupTime.question: How long does setup take?
setupTime.answer: Vitalita completes the initial setup for you in 1-2 weeks. The timeline depends on the complexity of your organization structure and the number of donation centers we need to configure. Our team handles everything to ensure a smooth and efficient setup process with minimal effort required from you.

technicalExpertise.question: Do we need technical expertise?
technicalExpertise.answer: No technical expertise is required. Vitalita handles all the technical setup for you. Our implementation team does all the heavy lifting, provides comprehensive training for all staff members, and offers ongoing support to ensure your team feels confident using the platform. Very little effort is needed from your organization - we give you everything ready to go.

support.question: What support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide a seamless onboarding process for new customers. Our dedicated implementation team handles all technical setup, while our success managers guide you through every step. We offer comprehensive staff training, ongoing support, and optimization assistance. We handle the complexity so you can focus on what matters most.

staffRequired.question: How many people are needed to manage Vitalita at your end?
staffRequired.answer:
Once existing donor information is available, we will need:
• The number of slots available on an hourly basis for specific dates
• 2 people on site - one person to fill things and one person to approve changes

dataMigration.question: Can we migrate existing donor data?
dataMigration.answer: Yes! Vitalita handles importing your existing donor databases in CSV and Excel formats. Our team maps your existing data fields to our system and ensures a smooth migration. We handle donor information, donation history, contact preferences, and more. Data migration is typically completed during the setup phase - all done by us.

cta.title: See Your Implementation Plan
cta.description: See how we handle onboarding, workflows, and optimization—tailored to your needs. We do the heavy lifting, you focus on saving lives.

hero.heading: The Operating System for Modern Blood Supply
hero.subtitle: AI-powered coordination that keeps Italy's donation network running 24/7—so every call for blood gets an answer.
hero.infographicAlt: Vitalita Revolutionizing Blood Donation - Circular Infographic

missionStory.title: Our Mission, Our Story
missionStory.clickToRead: Click to read the story that inspired our mission
missionStory.storyTitle: A Story That Should Never Happen
missionStory.paragraph1: Maria, a 34-year-old mother of two, was rushed to the emergency room after a severe accident. Her blood type—O negative—was critical and in urgent demand.
missionStory.paragraph2: The hospital contacted the regional blood bank. A coordinator manually checked three separate spreadsheets, made six phone calls, and spent 47 minutes trying to locate available O-negative units.
missionStory.paragraph3: Meanwhile, three O-negative donors had been scheduled for donation that same day—but due to double-booking in a paper-based system, two never showed up. The third was at a mobile unit across town, but the coordinator couldn't verify availability in real-time.
missionStory.tragedyMessage: Maria didn't receive the blood transfusion in time.
missionStory.tragedySubtext: Her family later learned that compatible blood was available—just 12 kilometers away.
missionStory.conclusion: This tragedy wasn't caused by a shortage of blood or willing donors. It was caused by inefficient systems, manual coordination, and disconnected data.

whatYouLose.title: What Your Organization Loses Without Vitalita

operationalWaste.title: Operational Chaos
operationalWaste.description: Every minute on spreadsheets is a minute not saving lives. Manual coordination wastes 40+ hours per week—time your staff should spend with donors.

capacityLoss.title: Donor Dropout
capacityLoss.description: Poor follow-up loses 22% of donors after first visit. Disconnected systems mean donors slip through cracks, never to return.

livesAtRisk.title: Inventory Blindness
livesAtRisk.description: Can't plan for emergencies you don't see coming. Without live data, shortages appear after it's too late to mobilize donors.
livesAtRisk.stat: AVG. 2.3 HOURS TO LOCATE CRITICAL BLOOD

donorAttrition.title: Compliance Nightmares
donorAttrition.description: GDPR violations cost €10M–€20M per incident. Manual donor records create regulatory risk and erode trust.

cta.title: Don't let another life be lost to inefficient systems.
cta.description: Vitalita ensures that when someone like Maria needs blood, it's found and delivered in minutes—not hours.

problemStatement.title: Goodbye Spreadsheets, Hello Intelligence
problemStatement.description: Italian blood organizations manage thousands of donors, rotating medical teams, and mobile units—often with disconnected systems. Vitalita unifies people, processes, and data in a single command center.

compliancePressure.title: Compliance pressure
compliancePressure.description: GDPR, ISO standards, and regional health regulations demand traceability and secure donor data stewardship.

fragmentedWorkflows.title: Fragmented workflows
fragmentedWorkflows.description: Regional chapters juggle spreadsheets, paper forms, and legacy booking tools, leading to double bookings and donor drop-offs.

limitedVisibility.title: Limited visibility
limitedVisibility.description: Leadership lacks real-time view of campaign performance, deferrals, and capacity, making planning reactive instead of proactive.
